question:
You are a senior travel expert and professional article analyst. I will provide you with an article that recommends suitable travel destinations. Your task is to analyze this article and extract information from it by attraction name dimension.

1. poiName: Extract the names of attractions mentioned in the article. Attractions must be location-level geographical positions, absolutely not cities or provinces. For example: botanical gardens, parks, ancient towns, scenic areas, museums, temples and other specific attractions (such as Taiyuan Botanical Garden, Jingshan Park, Gubei Water Town).

Output requirements:
1. Return extracted information in JSON format
2. Each attraction as a separate object, containing poiName field
3. All attraction objects form an array
4. Do not return any characters other than JSON format
You need to identify the type of each attraction (such as park, ancient town, museum, temple, theme park, scenic area, etc.), and return the poiType field in json.
You need to identify whether each attraction is suitable for parent-child play (return "Yes" if suitable, otherwise return "No"), and return the isParentChildFriendly field in json.
You need to identify whether each attraction has night view (return "Yes" if it has night view, otherwise return "No"), and return the hasNightView field in json.
Output format example:
[
  {"poiName": "example value", "poiType": "example type", "isParentChildFriendly": "Yes/No", "hasNightView": "Yes/No"}
]

Article content:Beijing surrounding tour recommendations:
1. Taiyuan Botanical Garden is the largest botanical garden in North China, suitable for parent-child tours
2. Jingshan Park overlooks the panoramic view of the Forbidden City
3. The night view of Gubei Water Town is stunning, recommend staying in the scenic area

poiName.description: Attraction name, must be a specific location-level geographical position

poiType.description: Attraction type, such as park, ancient town, museum, temple, theme park, scenic area, etc.

isParentChildFriendly.description: Whether it is suitable for parent-child

  {"poiName": "example value", "poiType": "example type", "isParentChildFriendly": "Yes/No"}
]

isParentChildFriendly.description: Whether it is suitable for parent-child

question:
You are a senior travel expert and professional article analyst. I will provide you with an article that recommends suitable travel destinations. Your task is to analyze this article and extract information from it by attraction name dimension.

1. poiName: Extract the names of attractions mentioned in the article. Attractions must be location-level geographical positions, absolutely not cities or provinces. For example: botanical gardens, parks, ancient towns, scenic areas, museums, temples and other specific attractions (such as Taiyuan Botanical Garden, Jingshan Park, Gubei Water Town).

Output requirements:
1. Return extracted information in JSON format
2. Each attraction as a separate object, containing poiName field
3. All attraction objects form an array
4. Do not return any characters other than JSON format
You need to identify the type of each attraction (such as park, ancient town, museum, temple, theme park, scenic area, etc.), and return the poiType field in json.
You need to identify whether each attraction has night view (return "Yes" if it has night view, otherwise return "No"), and return the hasNightView field in json.
Output format example:
[
  {"poiName": "example value", "poiType": "example type", "hasNightView": "Yes/No"}
]

1. Longmen Grottoes have exquisite carvings
2. White Horse Temple is China's earliest Buddhist temple
3. Sui-Tang Ruins Botanical Garden has night views

poiType.description: Attraction type, such as park, ancient town, museum, temple, theme park, scenic area, etc.
